Thank you for installing the Commerce Server Contrib Configuration package.

This package has added references to CommerceServerContrib.Web.dll and CommerceServerContrib.CrossTier.dll to your web application and configured it to use those assemblies.

For more information on Commerce Server Contrib please visit http://cstemplates.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Commerce%20Server%20Contrib&referringTitle=Documentation
